analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0x510f9f5928ac008239913cda86613ab437069c57.sol:
	Contract HTL has payable functions:
	 - make (/unique_chucks/10/0x510f9f5928ac008239913cda86613ab437069c57.sol#120-128)
	 - burn (/unique_chucks/10/0x510f9f5928ac008239913cda86613ab437069c57.sol#128-138)
	 - HTL (/unique_chucks/10/0x510f9f5928ac008239913cda86613ab437069c57.sol#150-151)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in OwnableToken.account (/unique_chucks/10/0x510f9f5928ac008239913cda86613ab437069c57.sol#110-118):
	External calls:
	- balances[_from] = safeMath.sub(balances[_from],_value) (/unique_chucks/10/0x510f9f5928ac008239913cda86613ab437069c57.sol#113-115)
	- balances[_to] = safeMath.add(balances[_to],_value) (/unique_chucks/10/0x510f9f5928ac008239913cda86613ab437069c57.sol#117)
	State variables written after the call(s):
